import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", gender: "", age: 0, work: "", residence: "", marriage: "", bmi: 0.0, smoking: "", avg_glucose_level: 0.0, }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, })); console.log(e.target.name, e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log(formData); }; // const generateBMI = () => { // const options = []; // for (let i = 0; i < 99; i++){ // options.push(i) // } // }; return (
); }; export default Form;
